sect1.title: Command and Real-time Acquisition in Parallelized PYthon (CRAPPY)
sect1.para: This package aims to provide easy-to-use tools for command and acquisition on complex experimental setups.
See DESCRIPTION.rst for a more complete description.

Only tested on Ubuntu 14.04 / 15.1 : git clone https://github.com/LaboratoireMecaniqueLille/crappy.git
cd crappy
sudo python setup install
The documentation can be compiled by simply running in the doc folder : make html

Note that you will need to install sphinx and numpy-doc: pip install -U Sphinx
apt-get install python-numpydoc
We used the scipy-style for Sphinx, you can find the original on SciPy's Github:
